Package eg.edittools

Class TextExchange

java.lang.Object
eg.edittools.TextExchange
public class TextExchange
extends java.lang.Object
The exchange of text between an EditableDocument set in the constructor and a variable EditableDocument. The first is named 'exchange document' and the second 'source document'. The source document is the document currently viewed in the main editor.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    TextExchange​(EditableDocument exchangeDoc, java.lang.String recentDir)  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Languages adoptedLanguage()
    Sets in this exchange document the language of the source document
    void changeLanguage​(Languages lang)
    Changes the language in the exchange editor
    void clear()
    Clears the exchange document
    void copyTextFromSource()
    Copies text selected in the source document and inserts the text at the caret position in the exchange document.
    void copyTextToSource()
    Copies text selected in the exchange document and inserts the text at the caret position in the source document.
    Languages language()
    Returns the language currently set in the exchange editor
    void loadFile()
    Loads the content of a file that is selected in the file chooser
    void save()
    Saves the content in the exchange document to the file 'exchangeContent.txt' in the program folder
    void setSourceDocument​(EditableDocument sourceDoc)
    Sets the EditableDocument that represents the source document
    java.lang.String sourceDocIndentUnit()
    Gets the indent unit of the source document

    • TextExchange

      public TextExchange​(EditableDocument exchangeDoc, java.lang.String recentDir)
      Parameters:
      exchangeDoc - the EditableDocument that represents the exchange document
      recentDir - the directory where a file was opened or saved the last time

  • Method Details

    • setSourceDocument

      public void setSourceDocument​(EditableDocument sourceDoc)
      Sets the EditableDocument that represents the source document
      Parameters:
      sourceDoc - the EditableDocument

    • copyTextFromSource

      public void copyTextFromSource()
      Copies text selected in the source document and inserts the text at the caret position in the exchange document. The text to copy replaces any selected text

    • copyTextToSource

      public void copyTextToSource()
      Copies text selected in the exchange document and inserts the text at the caret position in the source document. The text to copy replaces any selected text

    • loadFile

      public void loadFile()
      Loads the content of a file that is selected in the file chooser

    • changeLanguage

      Changes the language in the exchange editor
      Parameters:
      lang - the language to change to
